channel.title: Chain Core Developer Edition Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Chain Core Developer Edition 1.1.1
item.description:
NOTE: This update will create a fresh blockchain if you were previously using versions 1.0.x or 1.1.0; please backup any blockchain data you wish to preserve.

  • Update the Chain Core server package to version 1.1.3
  • Improved startup detection of other Chain Cores
